```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
```

```{r racewins}
results <- read_csv("F1Data/results.csv")
constructors <- read_csv("F1Data/constructors.csv")
drivers <- read_csv("F1Data/drivers.csv") 

resdrivers <- full_join(results %>% select(driverId, constructorId, position),
                 drivers) 

resdrivers %>% 
  filter(position == "1") %>%
  count(driverRef, sort = TRUE) %>%
  filter(n > 10) %>%
   ggplot(aes(x = n, y = driverRef)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Race Wins",
       y = "Driver")
  

```
